DOC.brief_summary: DHEA supplementation has been used in women with infertility and diminished ovarian reserve. There is a small report in 5 women with POF that benefited from the use of DHEA over several months. The investigators aim to evaluate further the use of DHEA in women with Premature ovarian failure (POF).
DOC.brief_title: The Use of DHEA in Women With Premature Ovarian Failure
DOC.criteria: women with POF women without ovaries
